landing.tagline: Digital Identity for Global Nepali Community
landing.description: Pravasi Nepali Sangh Bharat is dedicated to serving the Nepali diaspora across India. Our Pramaan System provides secure, verified digital membership cards to connect and empower our community.
landing.mission: Preserving heritage, building bridges, empowering lives.
